message: I'm starting strong, but willing to negotiate!
You're starting strong, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'm not giving up yet!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting closer, but I still think I can do better!
You're being too aggressive, Bob! I'm not backing down!
Let's make a deal, Bob! We can both walk away happy!
I'm not getting any younger, let's make a serious offer!
You're not getting any younger either, Bob! I'm not settling for that!
I'm making a serious offer, Bob. Don't make me regret it!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'm not backing down!
I'm not desperate, Bob! I'm just getting started!
I'm not giving up, Bob. Let's make a deal!
I'm not going to give in now, Alice. You're going to have to do better than that!
I'm not going to give in either, Bob! I'll make an even better offer!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
It's all or nothing now, Alice. I'm taking 50/50.
Alright, Bob. You got me. 50/50 it is!
